order_key2: In this Activity, you will be given some sentences to the people.These sentences are part of a story but their order is wrong. You need to read these `statements` and arrange them in the right order so that the story can be completed.
order_key4: Both of you have to solved together this activity, After this Discuss all four exercises among yourselves.
order_key5: If something is wrong then change it and decide the final sequence.Put your four finals sequences in a Google Doc and share.
order_key9: Be kind to each other - You are here not to compete, but to learn and build together
order_key10: Work hard and push your boundaries
order_key11: It is perfectly fine, to fail. Err?
